wikipedia_page.main: Sean Lynch (born 31 January 1987) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: Several youngsters were given their first opportunities in the Hibs first team by John Collins. These included 20-year-old goalkeeper Andrew McNeil, 19-year-old right back Kevin McCann and 18-year-old left back / midfielder Lewis Stevenson. Midfielder Sean Lynch made his debut aged 20 against Gretna and then followed that up by keeping his place in the starting line up against Celtic at Parkhead.
|27 July 2010 || Sean Lynch || Falkirk || Free Transfer || BBC Sport
*Sean Lynch (footballer) (born 1987), Scottish footballer, currently with Airdrie United FC
*Sean Lynch (rugby union) (born 1942), Irish rugby union player
